channel.title: CVE Feed for Mirantis -- Lens
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mirantis -- Lens

item.title: CVE-2021-23154|2024-08-03T18:58:26.305Z -- mirantis -- lens
item.description: In Lens prior to 5.3.4, custom helm chart configuration creates helm commands from string concatenation of provided arguments which are then executed in the user's shell. Arguments can be provided which cause arbitrary shell commands to run on the system.
